attributes.action: raise the speed limit for vans to 70mph the same as cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is a draconian law that limits vans to 60mph and no-one abides by it because todays vans have perfomance deisel engines that can do 130 mph  they should be allowed to do 70mph this law was passed when there was commer vans on the roads they only did 50 anyway
